name: HKElectrocardiogramQuery
desc: A query that returns the underlying voltage measurements for an electrocardiogram sample.

items.name: init(HKElectrocardiogram, dataHandler: (HKElectrocardiogramQuery, HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a new electrocardiogram query object.

items.name: enum HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result
items.desc: Partial results for an electrocardiogram query.
